pkgmetadata.longdescription: dnscrypt-proxy provides local service which can be used directly as your local resolver or as a DNS forwarder, encrypting and authenticating requests using the DNSCrypt protocol and passing them to an upstream server.

use.flag: Enable plugin support to inspect and modify queries and responses
Use systemd's socket activation instead of creating the sockets itself
Verify signarure with app-crypt/minisign before the package is built
